body:
# Cardano Node 1.13.0

This release completes  the development of many core Shelley features and provides basic Shelley functionality for stake pools and delegation. It delivers new CLI commands for obtaining Shelley stake pool information and creating MIR certificates, a new network `KeepAlive` mini-protocol. It also prepares the Cardano blockchain for the Byron-to-Shelley hard fork operational change that will deactivate Byron mode and will enable the Shelley decentralised mode.  This release also includes improvements in existing Shelley CLI commands, as well as in KES and VRF cryptographic key processing, Praos chain selection and hard fork implementation.  In addition, logging, tracing, error messages and documentation have been improved, and a few outstanding issues have been fixed, notably, an issue that was causing high CPU usage on MacOS.

The Shelley features have been pre-released for public testing and review on the [Cardano Shelley Testnet](https://testnets.cardano.org/en/shelley/overview/).
They are not available in the Byron mode, and are, therefore, deactivated on the Cardano mainnet. 

Deployed on the [Shelley testnet](https://testnets.cardano.org/en/shelley/overview/) on 5 June 2020.
Deployed on the mainnet on 9 June 2020.

## New features
- New commands in the node CLI:
  - to query stake addresses, balance and delegation (#1053, #1129)
  - to get the stake pool id (#1069)
  - to create MIR certificates (#1075)
- New `KeepAlive` network mini-protocol ([#2175](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2175))
- New monitoring metric for KES key periods, including remaining ones (#1030, #1144)
- New local ledger state query to get the current state of stake addresses, namely, their reward account balance, and current delegation choice (if any) ([#2161](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2161))

## Improvements
- Changed the Shelley CLI command and flag names to be more consistent (#1068)
- Improved logging for mempool transaction validation failures (#1035)
- Added logging of the epoch number as well as the slot number (#1108)
- Fixed logging of node information on startup (#1122)
- Extended tracing for benchmarking analysis (#1091)
- Improved human readable error messages for Shelley commands (#1021)
- Improved error message for transaction input parser errors (#1066)
- Updated _Making Shelley blockchain from scratch_ documentation (#1062)
- Improved hard fork implementation ([#2139](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2139), [#2150](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2150), [#2151](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2151), [#2152](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2152), [#2158](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2158), [#2165](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2165), [#2177](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2177), [#2183](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2183), [#2192](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2192), [#2199](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2199)) 
- Prepared for the Byron-to-Shelley hard-fork ([#2163](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2163), [#2145](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2145), [#2182](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2182), [#2185](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2185), [#2187](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2187))
- Changed the Praos protocol chain selection rule to be deterministic based on the chain values (using the leader VRF key) rather than relying on the order of arrival; this reduces network node congestion ([#2195](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2195))
- Evolved the KES keys eagerly rather than on-demand ([#2160](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2160))
- Distinguished cases when a node should be slot leader, but cannot forge ([#2169](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2169), [#2171](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/2171), [#2172](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2172), [#2176](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2176), [#2193](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2193))
- Improved tracing of block forging, and forge errors ([#2168](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/2168), [#2170](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2170))
- Increased the header size estimate to avoid ingress queue overruns ([#2206](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2206))
- Shelley ledger changes:
  - Provided delegators a whole epoch to react to pool parameter changes ([#1494](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1494))
  - Included the VRF key in the hash-to-genesis delegation mapping  ([#1495](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1495), [#1501](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1501))
  - Changed MIR certificates so they can now draw from either the treasury, or reserves ([#1513](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1513))
  - MIR certificates are witnessed by the genesis delegates, not genesis keys ([#1513](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1513))
  - Dropped the use of the "set" tag from the CDDL ([#1505](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1505))
  - Improved to use the right binary format for stake addresses ([#1491](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1491))
  - Included the network id in addresses (by value, not type) ([#1487](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1487))
  - Documented the network id and binary format in the specification ([#1500](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1505))

## Resolved issues
- Fixed high CPU usage on MacOS (#770)
- Fixed override order for the node socket: first CLI, then config file (#1124, #1145)
- Fixed error handling on genesis file parse errors (#1134)
- Fixed various issues with Live View (#1076, #1126)
- Fixed the parsing of the pool margin in pool registration certificates (#1063, #1110)
- Fixed mempool issues ([#1498](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1498), [#2006](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/2006))

- Fixed off-by-one error in pool retirement epoch in both, Shelley ledger specification and code ([#1511](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1511))

## Known Issues

body:
# Cardano Node 1.12.0

This release includes the integration of the majority of the Shelley features within the node and corresponding support in the command line tool. This includes the ability:

* to start a blockchain from genesis in Shelley mode;
* to create and use Shelley payment addresses and stake addresses;
* the ability to register and delegate to stake pools; and
* the ability to create blocks using stake pools.

The Shelley features are not available in the Byron mode, and so, are deactivated on the Cardano mainnet. They are pre-released and being tested on the [Cardano Shelley Testnet](https://testnets.cardano.org/en/shelley-haskell/overview/).

In addition, logging, tracing and error messages have been improved, and a few issues have been fixed.

Deployed on the mainnet on 28 May 2020. 

## New features
- [`cardano-cli`](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-node/blob/master/cardano-cli/) has been extracted into a separate cardano-node sub-component (#819). It provides a command line interface for various low-level node-related functionality. Byron and Shelley relevant commands are distinguished by its prefixed `byron` and `shelley` command keywords. Documentation on constructing a Shelley chain from scratch (#893, #932, #1000) has been added. The following new commands were implemented:
  - generate Shelley KES and VRF keys (#816)
  - generate Shelley address keys (#824)
  - create Shelley genesis (#852, #864, #908, #926, #929)
  - key-gen commands for various Shelley keys (#846, #870)
  - commands for Shelley address construction (#870, #872, #887)
  - Shelley transaction sign command (#894, #900)
  - Shelley transaction submission command (#904)
  - node query commands (#880, #884, #903, #918, #920, #933, #994, #1008, #1016)
  - commands to create stake address certificates (#890, #919, #967)
  - commands to create stakepool certificates (#922)
  - system commands to update genesis delegations and create MIR certificates (#895)
  - calculate the minimum fee for a transaction (#931)
  - view the content of the various binary files (#915)
  - create Shelley protocol param updates (#950, #1004)
  - Byron update proposal vote creation and submission (#804)
  - version command and `--version` flag, with git revision (#959)
- Added new `cardano-client` library in the network component to provide a simpler node client API ([#2109](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2109))
- Added support of initial Shelley protocol parameters in the Shelley genesis (#906)
- Added new `--shutdown-on-slot-synced` flag for the benchmarking and CI tests (#776)
- Added hard fork support ([#2034](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2034), additional PRs in the [Changelog](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-node/blame/f6ef186d1f7280585a245c8565d92117133cf359/cardano-node/ChangeLog.md#L23))

## Improvements
- CLI commands that talk to the node no longer require the node config file (#901, #907, #917, #913, #928)
- Improved human readable error messages for CLI Byron commands (#1003)
- Added `systemd` socket activiation support (#856, #1022, [#1995](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1995)) 
- `systemd` support on Linux is now optional (#911)
- Improved `FetchDecision` tracing output (#863)
- Improved suppression of frequent repeated log messages (#842)
- Added logging of the node's network magic number on startup (#921)
- Adjusted configuration to keep metrics out of the log files (#930)
- Added trace of the node uptime (#892)
- Added trace of the number of transactions processed and blocks forged (#937, #943)
- Added trace for race of the current set of node peers for the live view (#1060 
- Added Darwin (macOS) support for OS metrics in the "live view" (#785)  
- Improved DB file locking behaviour ([#1906](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1906), [#2031](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2031), [#2033](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2033))
- Added memory leak detection for Shelley transactions for mempool ([#2010](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2010))
- Fixed the construction of the Shelley initial UTxO ([#2038](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2038), [#2046](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2046))
- The Shelley protocol parameters are included into the Shelley genesis ([#2040](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2040))
- Used an improved more realistic KES implementation ([#2092](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2092))
- Provided Shelley-compliant handling of OCert issue number in chain selection ([#2108](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2108))
- Provided interface for node clients with minimal configuration ([#2050](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2050), [#2056](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2056))
- Added whole or filtered options for UTxO in local state query ([#2016](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2016), [#2110](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2110))
- Improved calculation of transaction sizes ([#2114](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2114), [#2115](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2115), [#2116](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2116))
- Used `TCP_NODELAY` for faster block relaying ([#2069](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2069))
- Added ability to shut down transaction submission protocol cleanly by receiving side ([#2090](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2090))
- Made protocol handlers dependent on the negotiated protocol version ([#2090](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2090))
- Exposed bits of the ledger state needed for the node live view ([#772](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger/pull/772))
- Added local state query for dumping a whole ledger state for test and debug ([#2113](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2113))

  - Removed the active slot coefficient from the set of parameters that could be changed via on-chain protocol parameter updates ([#1394](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1394))
  - Simplified specification and implementation of transaction size calculation ([#1405](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1405))
  - Adjusted the definition of total stake ([#1428](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1428), [#1437](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1437))
  - Added support for minimum UTxO, aka non-decaying deposits ([#1447](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1447))
  - Finalised decision on final network Id number assignments in address format ([#1465](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1465))
  - Documented specific cryptographic choices in the specification appendix ([#1389](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1389))
  - Added options to local state query for querying the UTxO, either by all, or by address ([#1402](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1402), [#1422](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1422))

  - Improved handling of cryptographic key roles ([#1410](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1410))
  - Improved details in ledger validation error reports ([#1442](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1442), [#1458](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1458), [#1463](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1463), [#1469](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1469), [#1470](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1470), [#1476](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1476))
  -  Added initial support for Byron addresses  in the pre-Shelley state ([#1473](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-ledger-specs/pull/1473))

## Resolved issues
- Fixed various live view issues(#964, #965, #974)
- Fixed structured tracing of transactions within adopted blocs for analysis tools (#993)
- Fixed handling of operational certificates for KES validity periods ([#2092](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2092), [#2094](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/2094))

## Known Issues

# Cardano Node 1.11.0
This release delivers full Windows support, and incremental improvements to the node in Byron mode, including improvements in logging, reduced disk I/O and network error handling improvements.

Most of the current development focus is on the Shelley mode. This release includes the initial integration of the Shelley ledger and Ourboros Praos consensus within the node. The Shelley features are not available in the Byron mode, and so not available on the Cardano mainnet. For the curious: following releases will include the CLI tools needed to run the node in Shelley mode locally.

Deployed on the mainnet on 28 April 2020.

## New features
- An option to log output in readable text form, rather than structured (#760)
- Up-to-date generated internal API documentation https://input-output-hk.github.io/ouroboros-network/

## Improvements
- Improved performance in logging&monitoring system (#831)
- Suppressed high frequency logging output during syncing (#773)
- Improved example configuration for "live view" (#827)
- Improved READMEs  (#793, #828)
- Verification of avoidance of excessive memory use in inbound transaction path ([#1645](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1645), [#1708](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1708)) 
- Improved restart times by storing a ledger snapshot after a long replay ([#1956](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1956))
- Renamed immutable chain DB files from `.epoch` to `.chunk` (with an automatic migration) ([#1755](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1755), [#1954](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1954))
- Minor disk I/O optimisation when serving headers and blocks ([#1978](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1978))
- Enabled local state query protocol with a V2 local IPC protocol ([#1522](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1522))

## Resolved issues
- Fixed handling of unknown versions in protocol version negotiation ([#1981](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1981))
- Fixed DNS error handling improvements during temporary network outages ([#1960](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1960), [#1961](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1961))

### Shelley features and improvements

Note that these include some Shelley-specific changes that were released earlier, but were not previously declared in the release notes.

- Integrated the Shelley ledger with the consensus layer ([#258](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/258), [#982](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/982), [#1403](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1403), [#1405](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1405), [#1820](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1820), [#1822](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1822), [#1824](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1824))

- Added changes to prepare for the Shelley hard fork ([#1750](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1750), [#1775](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1775))
- Added Shelley genesis file support (#798)
- Added initial support for starting a node in Shelley mode (#820)
- Added initial support for loading Shelley node leader credentials (#832)
- Added support for reading/writing human-readable Shelley key file formats (#826, #829)
- Improved Shelley ledger integration ([#1963](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1963), [#1821](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/issues/1821), [#1967](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1967), [#1984](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1984), [#1986](https://github.com/input-output-hk/ouroboros-network/pull/1986))
